title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jul 29 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jul 29 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2: D.C. reinstates indoor mask mandate, including for ages 2 and up. The Department of Justice against voter security. The liberal plan is to create nonstop covid fear. House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy (R-CA) joins Clay and Buck to talk about Pelosi's mask mandates: fining representatives $500, arresting staffers. Masks are required on the House side, but not the Senate side. Pelosi's hair salon hypocrisy. "How did Nancy Pelosi's husband make $5 million over two months not buying stock, but by buying options on something that we’re debating in the House?" Democrats are fine with the covid-infected crossing the border, but not fully vaccinated walking around the Capitol. "Mask madness is spreading faster than the virus itself."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
